data.name: Anodyne 2: Return to Dust
data.detailed_description:
Wishlist Anodyne 2 today! Enter an evocative, surreal, lo-fi 3D and 2D world. The follow up to 2013's Anodyne is finally here!

Play as Nova, the Nano Cleaner, who is tasked with collecting dangerous Nano Dust growing throughout New Theland, which then must be returned for recycling to a mysterious entity, only known as the "Center".

Walk or ride across a lush, moody world in full 3D. Discover strange characters and places. Shrink into characters and collect Nano Dust through 2D, Zelda-like gameplay, reminiscent of Anodyne 1.

Discover the true nature of the Nano Dust, Nova, and The Center, in the latest game from Analgesic Productions.

Much like Final Fantasy, there's no need to play Anodyne 1 to understand Anodyne 2's story, but longtime fans will find connections to Anodyne 1! Anodyne 2 is the newest installment in the "Anodyne Franchise".

Analgesic Productions is Marina Kittaka and Sean Han Tani. Be sure to visit our website to join the newsletter. We're also the creators of Even the Ocean, All Our Asias, Bratavism, and more.

Check out Anodyne 1 below. http://store.steampowered.com/app/234900/Anodyne/

data.short_description: In this sequel to Anodyne, explore vast 3D landscapes and shrink into surreal, 2D worlds in characters' bodies. With PSX and 16-bit-influenced art styles, play as Nova, the Nano Cleaner. Seek out Cards, and clean the world's dangerous Nano Dust in order to protect the mysterious entity, "The Center".

pc_requirements.minimum:
最低配備:
  • 作業系統: Windows 7
  • 處理器: Dual-core 2.5 GHz
  • 記憶體: 4 GB 記憶體
  • 顯示卡: GeForce 610M
  • 儲存空間: 2 GB 可用空間
  • 音效卡: Any
  • 備註: Game features options to turn off expensive effects like shadows or water, which may allow GPUs weaker than 610M to run at 60 FPS

mac_requirements.minimum:
最低配備:
  • 作業系統: 10.12 or higher. Earlier versions are NOT supported.
  • 處理器: Dual-core 2.5 GHz
  • 記憶體: 4 GB 記憶體
  • 顯示卡: GeForce 610M Equivalent
  • 儲存空間: 4 GB 可用空間
  • 音效卡: Any
  • 備註: Game features options to turn off expensive effects like shadows or water, which may allow GPUs weaker than 610M to run at 60 FPS

linux_requirements.minimum:
最低配備:
  • 作業系統: Recent Ubuntu/Steam OS ONLY
  • 處理器: Dual-core 2.5 GHz
  • 顯示卡: GeForce 610M Equivalent
  • 儲存空間: 4 GB 可用空間
  • 音效卡: Any
  • 備註: Game features options to turn off expensive effects like shadows or water, which may allow GPUs weaker than 610M to run at 60 FPS. Non-Ubuntu/Steam OS are NOT guaranteed to be supported.

data.legal_notice: "Anodyne" is a registered trademark and copyright of  Analgesic Productions. Anodyne 2: Return to Dust does not collect any personally identifying information from you, the player.
